Class RouteLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.aircompany.logic.BaseLogic
      • com.epam.aircompany.logic.RouteLogic

  • public class RouteLogic
extends BaseLogic
    The Class RouteLogic contains various methods that use DAO layer to retrieve information about the Route(s) from a database.
